name: KEYLLR
description:
KEYLLR is a game where you play as Robert, a ninja that gets trapped in an infinitley looping room by a monster named KEYLLR, now robert must survive for as long as possible in this room, and perhaps in an update coming soon he could defeat KEYLLR completley, who knows...

There is 1 gamemode currently, with the next one coming soon, this is why there is a lock on the gamemode select screen on one of the buttons, once I release this new gamemode the button will be unlocked and you will be able to [リ𝙹ℸ ̣ ⍑╎リ⊣ ⍑ᒷ∷ᒷ], Good luck!
